title: The Tsar's Masquerade
description: A secret letter from the past changes the course of history. Thus begins this historical novel about the last Tsar of Russia and his family. This is the story as you wished it were told. A tale of a loving father and husband who would do everything in his power to save his family. The stories and anecdotes you love are woven together to form an intricate and complex story unfolding in a way you never expected. Fiction and historical fact are blended together in a such a way that this novel feels very plausible. Over five years of intense research, interviews and writing went into this book.
author: Raphael Mercikovsky
